summary: Implements a collection of template filters that transform raw values into human‑readable forms, such as adding commas to numbers, converting large numbers to word representations, formatting dates relative to the current day, expressing time differences in natural language, and generating ordinal strings, while respecting internationalisation settings.
business_intent: Enhance the presentation layer of web applications by providing easy‑to‑use, locale‑aware formatting utilities that make numeric and temporal data more understandable for end users.
